name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 詐騙網站及內容農場評價系統
name.en: Scam Web and Content Farm Filter and Critic

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 本插件可封鎖詐騙網站及內容農場的文章，使用者可留下文章的評價以幫助其他人決定是否讀取該文
short.en: This extension is to block Scam Web and Content Farm and  'Critic' the articles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
[Reason of This App]
This chrome extension allows you to leave some comments for scam website and contect farm article. So that you may read the comments that someone left before you read article.
發現詐騙網站，立即點選APP圖示點選回報，當超過十人舉報，立即加入黑名單中

一、封鎖詐騙網站
有鑑於fb詐騙網站盛行，我的封鎖內容農場app可協助進行封鎖，避免其他人被詐騙，請在反應詐騙網站的網址，我會加入我的封鎖內容農場的app進行攔截

二、封鎖內容農場
你今天又「被」震驚了嗎？
十億人又驚呆了嗎？
10個驚人的事實，你到底不敢相信第幾個？
這些誇大虛假的文章及新聞充斥在網路之中，吸引你的好奇心，卻只是到處轉貼的網路流言
內容農場的內容都十分空洞，透過隱藏某些資訊來吸引閱讀者的好奇心，賺取點擊及廣告
然而，沒有辦法防止這些文章到處流傳嗎？
本插件提供網路文章互評機制，你可以觀看其他使用者的意見，也可以自己留下內容來告知其他使用者
讓我們拒絕假新聞及垃圾文章從自己做起。

Easy to determine fake information.
Protect Browse clear and clean.
we can perview the comments of this article below.
the comments leaved from the other user before
so that, we can decide  to see or not.
to against the fake and exaggeration culture of internet.

[Steps]
1.至Chome web Store安裝評價內容農場插件
2.每當偵測到文章來自內容農場時，就會出現封鎖內容及評價
3.你可觀看其他人所留下的評價及評語再決定是否觀看該文章
4.當然，你也可以點閱該文章以後，再留下評論給後續使用者作為是否觀看的依據
5.若你覺得某人的評價非常有價值，請不吝於幫他點個讚
6.本插件仰賴大家的幫忙與協助，請大家踴躍提供評價
7.若你發現有其他尚未過濾到的網站，請協助留下該網站資料

[計畫網站Project web]
https://github.com/xianshengyou8/filterfarm

[加入黑名單Block List]
https://www.facebook.com/BlockandCriticContentFarm/

[Online Version]
* V3 2017/12/31：使用者可自行提出舉報

[Update List]
* V3 2017/12/31：使用者可自行提出舉報
* V2 2017/09/05：上線測試
* V2.5 2017/06/26: block scam website
* V2.3 2017/06/25: block scam website

* V2.0 2017/05/16：update db

   - Visit：Chome web Store(ContenFarm Filter and Critic)

long.en:
[Reason of This App]
Have you Shocked today?
One billion people couldn't Believe their Eyes!？
10 Unbelievable facts, the third Stunned Me! 
Those fake and exaggeration articles show up everywhere. How to block them now?
It's the time that we need to do something.
This extension for chrome is not only block but also "Critic" the articles.
We can preview the comments of this article below. The comments leaved from the other user before
So that, we can decide to see or not.
We need your help?
It's the easy way to against the fake and exaggeration culture of internet.

[Steps]
1.Install this extension 
2.When goin to content farm, the block page will show up
3.You can preview the comments of this article below then decide to see or not
4.Of course, you may go to read it. And leave some comments for next user
5.If you find some comments is very useful, please click like for him.
6.We really need everybody's help to against the fake and exaggeration culture of internet.
7.If you find other content farm web, please help us add it to block list.

[Project web]
https://github.com/xianshengyou8/filterfarm

[Block List]
https://www.facebook.com/BlockandCriticContentFarm/

[Online Version]
* V3.2 2017/09/01：update code

[Update List]
* V2.9 2017/07/05：detect connect 
* V2.5 2017/06/26: block scam website
* V2.3 2017/06/25: block scam website
* V2.1 2017/05/16：update db
* V2.0 2017/05/16：update db
